description:
I invite you to join to the first meeting, to talk about photography and what do you like to learn more about, techniques? ideas? themes, what are you looking for to develop more?

We can meet in this café-Bar : http://www.epaulejete.be/

It's in the corner of the Place Flagey
name: Let's meet around photo!

description:
Hi every body,

I hope you can join for this photo talk, we can get together and talk around photography, techniques and ides, making new projects and learn more and more!
how_to_find_us: Let's meet of top floor of Cfé-Bar Epaulé jeté!
name: Let's meet around photo!

description:
Improve your portrait shots.


You will learn:


- How the aperture and F-stops works!

- The relation between aperture and depth of field(DOF)


A  workshop to learn  and practice aperture priority on your camera,tips and lessons on portrait and lightening!

- 2 hours of lessons, tips and practice!

NOTE:
- All cameras are welcome from point and shoot to DSLR's
- Minimum 4 participants, maximum 10
name: Aperture and portrait workshop!

description:
Learning depth of field is an important element to improve your knowledge of Aperture.

In this lesson you will learn how the aperture works and how we will use it to control the light and the depth of field.

The lesson will have two parts: Theoretical and practical.

We will practice the the depth of field by taking photos in park, which would be full of great autumn colors :)

All you need is a DSLR camera!
name: Learning depth of field
